ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Re: Avoiding faction hits in PoG when pulling
ygData.msgSnippet: Tell him you have come for the phat lewt.  Just besure to have a cleric nearby to rez you afterwards, has he gets a bit annoyed and will kill you. lol. Rokenn
ygData.messageBody:
Tell him you have come for the phat lewt. Just besure to have a cleric
nearby to rez you afterwards, has he gets a bit annoyed and will kill you.
lol.

Rokenn

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Moss [mailto:Olmoss@...]
> Sent: Wednesday, January 24, 2001 12:58 PM
> To: eqbards@egroups.com
> Subject: Re: [eqbards] Re: Avoiding faction hits in PoG when pulling
>
>
> James Schuldes wrote:
> > What I dont understand is: why is our loot dropping there?
> > Yes, there are quests that offer very similar rewards but
> have you tried to
> > get them? PoG drops the items <snip>
>
> What quests Jim ? Moonflower has spent 2 days there "Hailing"
> everything. The ONLY creature that responds is the Prince and
> he doesn't
> respond no matter what I ask after he asks why I came... This
> is really
> poorly thought out....
